content.text: Good, thanks for asking! I'm a doctor, so I need to get plenty of rest so I can be at my best for my patients.  What do you do for a living?
I'm a musician, but I recently had to drop out of college to help with my grandparents.  I'm also clumsy, but I don't let it stop me from living my life!
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that about college! But it's good that you're able to help out your grandparents.  Clumsy people are the best, they always make me laugh.
Thanks!  I like to think I'm pretty funny too.  I recently became truthful with my coach, and it was a really good experience.
That's awesome!  I'm glad it was a good experience.  I love reading, and I play guitar.  I also have a cat named Leroy Jenkins.
Wow, Leroy Jenkins!  That's a great name for a cat.  I love reading too, but I don't play guitar.  I do play the piano though.
That's cool!  I've always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
It's not too hard, you should give it a try!  I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks!  I might just do that.
